item.text: Block Chain is a technology - simply put a way to save history of transactions in a way that this history can't be changed by a central authority.
Ethereum does use block chain technology - but ....
Ethereum, for example, does use block chain technology - but Ethereum is not just a block chain.

Ethereum, for example, does use block chain technology - but Ethereum is not just a block chain. It is a whole ecosystem and a stack to develop cryptographic contacts for which the Ethereum block chain is used.
Eris is not a block chain either, it is a block chain design - a software stack which allows anyone to build their own block chain.

To make a long story short - block chain on it's own is just a particular way to organise a database. It can record transactions and you can build applications which use this database. All together it is a system.

story.text: Block Chain is a technology - simply put a way to save history of transactions in a way that this history can't be changed by a central authority.

Ethereum, for example, does use block chain technology - but Ethereum is not just a block chain. It is a whole ecosystem and a stack to develop cryptographic contacts for which the Ethereum block chain is used.
Eris is not a block chain either, it is a block chain design - a software stack which allows anyone to build their own block chain.

To make a long story short - block chain on it's own is just a particular way to organise a database. It can record transactions and you can build applications which use this database. All together it is a system.
